languages.text: Положительный модификатор к значению навыка, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и прочим параметрам персонажа. Бонусы можно получить от различных {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, предметов или действий (например, при перемещении за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g}).

A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.
languages.original_text: Положительный модификатор к значению навыка, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и прочим параметрам персонажа. Бонусы можно получить от различных {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, предметов или действий (например, при перемещении за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g}).

traits.locale_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or characteristic score, damage, armour, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different abilities, items, or actions such as use of cover.
A positive modifier applied to a skill or characteristic score, damage, armour, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different abilities, items, or actions such as use of cover.

A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

languages.text: Ein positiver Modifikator, der auf Fertigkeits- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaftswerte{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und andere Charakterparameter angewendet wird. Ein Bonus kann durch verschiedene {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, Gegenstände oder Aktionen, wie die Nutzung von {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, gewährt werden.
languages.original_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein positiver Modifikator, der auf Fertigkeits- oder Eigenschaftswerte, Schaden, Rüstung und andere Charakterparameter angewendet wird. Ein Bonus kann durch verschiedene Fähigkeiten, Gegenstände oder Aktionen, wie z. B. die Nutzung von Deckung, gewährt werden.

languages.text: Modificateur positif appliqué au score d'une compétence ou d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g}, aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et à d'autres paramètres du personnage. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, objets ou actions (par exemple, en profitant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g}) peuvent conférer différents bonus.
languages.original_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Modificateur positif appliqué au score d'une compétence ou d'une caractéristique, aux dégâts, à l'armure et autres paramètres du personnage. Un bonus peut être conféré par une capacité, un objet ou une action.

languages.text: 适用于技能、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}或其他参数的正向修正值。加值可能由不同的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、物品或行动提供。例如，躲在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面可以提高闪避值。
languages.original_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 适用于技能、属性、伤害、护甲或其他参数的正向修正值。加值可能由不同的能力、物品或行动提供。例如，使用部分药剂可以提高属性加值。

languages.text: Un modificador positivo que se aplica a una habilidad, a una {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g}, al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} o a otro parámetro del personaje. Las bonificaciones pueden obtenerse por medio de diferentes {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, objetos o acciones como ponerse a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g}.
languages.original_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un modificador positivo que se aplica a una {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g}, a una característica, al daño, a la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} o a otro parámetro del personaje. Las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} pueden obtenerse por medio de diferentes {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, objetos o acciones como ponerse {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}a cubierto{/g}.

languages.text: プラス調整はスキルまたは{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}スコア、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、およびその他のキャラクターパラメータに適用される。ボーナスは異なる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}やアイテム、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}使用のようなアクションによって提供される。
languages.original_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: プラス調整はスキルまたは特性スコア、ダメージ、アーマー、およびその他のキャラクターパラメータに適用される。ボーナスは異なるアビリティやアイテム、カバー使用のようなアクションによって提供される。

languages.text: Bir yetenek veya {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelik{/g} değerine, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırha{/g} ve benzeri karakter parametrelerine uygulanan pozitif değiştirici. Çeşitli {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g}, eşyalar veya {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} kullanmak gibi eylemler; bonus kazandırabilir.
languages.original_text: A positive modifier applied to a skill or {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other character parameters. A bonus can be provided by different {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, items, or actions, such as use of {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.
